Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: A deluxe business hotel in Shanghai, our premier event space totals more than 2,000 square meters.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: We offer accommodations and sustainable meeting packages for business travelers and conferences.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Grand ballroom accommodates 550 for a seated dinner and features a nine-by-five meter LED screen.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Junior Ballroom features a ceiling height of seven meters and accommodates 220 for a seated dinner.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Our Shanghai business hotel features state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment and connectivity.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Unique among business hotels, Shanghai event planners coordinate events from start to finish.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Spacious Shanghai hotel suites offer luxurious bathrooms and separate bathtubs and showers.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Our brand new luxury hotel features 720 guest rooms and stylish suites with an executive lounge.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: In-room amenities include in-room safes, mini-bars, coffee/tea service and iPod docking stations.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Among Shanghai suites, we offer lush bedding, down comforters, custom duvets and cotton-rich linen.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Personal climate control is a convenient feature in all rooms for comfortable rest and relaxation.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Among hotel suites, Shanghai Wi-Fi, 42-inch LCD TVs and large well-lit work desks are available.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Spacious Shanghai hotel suites offer luxurious bathrooms and separate bathtubs and showers.
Our brand new luxury hotel features 720 guest rooms and stylish suites with an executive lounge.
In-room amenities include in-room safes, mini-bars, coffee/tea service and iPod docking stations.
Among Shanghai suites, we offer lush bedding, down comforters, custom duvets and cotton-rich linen.
Personal climate control is a convenient feature in all rooms for comfortable rest and relaxation.
Among hotel suites, Shanghai Wi-Fi, 42-inch LCD TVs and large well-lit work desks are available.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our wedding venue Shanghai hotel offers ideal accommodations for out-of-town wedding guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Dedicated Shanghai hotel wedding reception facilities offer more than 2,000 square meters of space.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: The dynamic Grand Ballroom comfortably accommodates up to 550 guests for an exquisite seated dinner.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Hotel amenities include a fitness center, indoor pool, restaurants and a great downtown location.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: For the best hotel wedding reception Shanghai has ever seen, enjoy our creative catering services.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Dedicated event planners are on-hand to personalize and coordinate events from start to finish.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Our distinct downtown Shanghai hotel's convenient location is within walking distance to People's Square and Nanjing Road.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Plan adept meetings and conferences at our Shanghai hotel with more than 21,000 square feet of downtown event space.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Additionally, we offer five on-site restaurants, serving international cuisine as well as a luxury spa and health club.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Experience "China's No. 1 Street" firsthand with our Shanghai hotel's location near Nanjing Road.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: People's Square, a vast green area with plants and surrounded by spectacular museums, is nearby.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Yu Garden is the largest of Shanghai's ancient gardens with Ming and Qing architectural styles.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: The Bund - The "World Architecture Museum", is the symbol of old and new Shanghai

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Xintiandi is a fashionable pedestrian street composed of Shikumen and modern architecture style

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Explore Manhattan of China - Lujiazui is China's economic centre

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Shanghai Marriott Hotel City Centre, a luxurious new hotel, is located in downtown Shanghai. Amenities include large event facilities, 5 restaurants, luxury spa and an indoor pool. Walking distance to Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street and metro.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Discover unmatched hospitality, an unbeatable location and superior amenities at one of the newest hotels in Shanghai city center, Shanghai Marriott Hotel City Centre. We are within walking distance to Nanjing Road, People's Square, the Bund and the metro station. Our Shanghai city center hotel is the perfect place to unwind when traveling for business or leisure with more than 700 rooms and suites featuring 42-inch LCD TVs, iPod docking stations, luxury bedding, Wi-Fi, safes, mini-bars and deluxe bathrooms. Enjoy international cuisine and local favorites from our chefs as they prepare various choices at our five delectable restaurants and lounges. After a day in the city, take a dip in our indoor pool, visit our fully equipped gym or enjoy a relaxing massage at our spa. Amenities at our hotel in Shanghai City Center include a business center, 24-hour room service and concierge. More than 21,000 square feet of dedicated event space awaits with two pillar-free ballrooms and seven additional meeting rooms.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Located minutes walk from People's Park and Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street on Xi Zang Road (Middle) the hotel offers a premium location for business and leisure traveller. The Bund and other key atractions are all with in a short walk.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Java+ is a refreshing escape from the ordinary and an ideal jumpstart to your day. This modern, lively neighborhood destination offers signature coffee and tea, freshly baked pastries, authentic cakes, squeezed juices and healthy grab-and-go sandwiches.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Discover tasty cuisine at Inagiku, a premier Japanese restaurant in Shanghai. This stylish, yet traditional, culinary delight offers premium sushi, teppanyaki and famous Inagiku tempura. Host small gatherings in one of our five private dining rooms.

Address.AddressLine: Level 2, 555 Xi Zang Road (Middle), Huangpu District

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Discover a welcoming retreat at The Lounge, featuring a sophisticated and elegant lounge set in an expansive glass atrium with natural daylight. Enjoy made-to-order afternoon tea, signature cocktails and an extensive single malt whisky selection.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Shanghai City Bistro presents a theater of culinary activity with open kitchens, engaged chefs and vibrant service and delivers simple, fresh, chef-crafted food focusing on global cuisine. Sample some of our delectable offerings morning, noon and night.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Man Ho redefines luxury dining by serving savory authentic Cantonese cuisine for a distinct dining experience. The restaurant offers 10 private dining rooms, with the largest accommodating 25 guests, perfect for hosting private gatherings in Shanghai.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Michelle Garnaut's famous restaurant offers international cuisine and spectacular views of the Bund.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Jean Georges' signature restaurant at Three on the Bund. Beautiful decor.

Address.AddressLine: 4th Floor, Bund 3, 3 Zhongshan Dongyi Road, Shanghai

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located in People's Park, Barbarossa is a popular night venue in Shanghai that is also perfect for lunch or dinner. Great Mediterranean style décor with outdoor rooftop balcony.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: This restaurant is set on the rooftop of the Shanghai Art Museum offering great views of People's Park and serves international fusion cuisine.

Address.AddressLine: 5th Floor, Shanghai Art Museum, 325 Nanjing West Road

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Set in a modern warehouse this restaurant has great décor and features traditional Japanese cuisine.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Open Year Around
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Romantic colonial Shanghai decor serving Shanghainese specialties. Bookings recommended.

Description.Text: KTV chain attracting locals for a night of karaoke.

Description.Name: Brief Description of Local Entertainment
Description.Text: RACKS MDB is an upscale lounge. The 'MDB' stands for music drinks billiards, but they've since added casual dining to their features.

Description.Name: Brief Description of Local Entertainment
Description.Text: The new incarnation of the Live Sound Garage.

Description.Name: Brief Description of Local Entertainment
Description.Text: A second living room for those who are hungry for quality live music & a home for blues and jazz musicians from all over the world.

Description.Name: Brief Description of Local Entertainment
Description.Text: NOT ME is a new venue located in the French Concession aimed to give party goers a new option from the usual hang-outs.

Description.Name: Brief Description of Local Entertainment
Description.Text: This spot is backed by the people at JZ Club and aims to showcase acoustic music in the heart of downtown Shanghai.

Description.Name: Brief Description of Local Entertainment

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Dirve north to Highway A1 for 17.2 km. Drive onto Highway A20 for 13.7 km.Then Drive onto Jiyang Road towards Puxi area. Then drive onto N-S Elevated Road for 6.5 km. Turn to Chongqing Road (Middle) and drive for 350 metres, turn to North Chengdu Road and drive for 1.6. Turn to Xinzha Road.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Bus from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Rail from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Drive onto No.1 Yingbin Road and turn at Huqingping Highway and drive for 1.2 km. Turn to Highway G318 and drive for 30 metres and turn at West Yan'an Road. Drive along Yan'an Elevated Road and get off on Nanjing Road. Drive till Xi Zang Road (Middle), turn left for 300 metres, turn at Feng Yang Road.

Description.Text: Children learn how to create their own stopmotion animation using video cameras and computers.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Covers basic sketching concepts by pencil, crayon, pastel, charcoal, water coloring and other media.

Spa marketing description
Description.Text: Take your mind to a place of peace and serenity at this luxury spa in Shanghai. We offer a variety of treatments and therapeutic techniques including massages and body scrubs as well as seven private treatment rooms and rejuvenating couples' services.

Description.Name: Fee Details
Description.Text: RMB 630 for weekdays and RMB 1230 for weekends

Description.Name: Year fitness center equipment was most recently replaced
Directions to Highway from Property
Description.Text: Head southeast on Xizang Road (Middle). Turn right at Xizang Road onto Yan'an East Road. Get onto the highway at the People's Square Entrance.

Description.Name: Directions from Highway to Property
Description.Text: Get off the highway at the Bund Exit. Head northeast on Yan'an East Road. Make a U-turn at Zhejiang Middle Road. Turn right at Xizang Road onto Xizang Road (Middle). Head north on Xizang Road (Middle). Make a U-turn at Beijing East Road.

Description.Name: Directions to Highway from Property
Description.Text: Head northwest on Xizang Road (Middle) onto Beijing West Road and turn left. Take the 2nd right onto Wenzhou Road. Turn left at Xinzha Road. Turn right at Chengdu North Road. Take the ramp on the left and get onto the Shimen'er Road Entrance.

Description.Name: Directions from Highway to Property
Description.Text: Take off the highway at Xinzha Road Exit. Head South and turn left at Xinzha Road. Turn right at Changsha Road. Turn left at Beijing West Road. Turn left at Xizang Road (Middle).

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: The Shanghai Marriott Hotel City Centre is opened on Nov. 24th, 2011. Located in downtown Shanghai, the new hotel features 720 guest rooms and suites, a fully-equipped fitness centre, an outstanding meetings & events floor, and 5 exciting dining choices.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: The Shanghai Marriott Hotel City Centre is ideally located in People Square - the official geographic centre of the city. Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street, People's Park and the Bund, plus the metro hub (lines 1, 2, 8) are all within close walking distance.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: The hotel boasts 720 tech-savvy guest rooms and suites, with high-speed wireless internet throughout the hotel. All guest rooms and suites are equipped with a 42' LCD TV, iPod docking station, luxury "Revive" bedding, separate bath tub and shower.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: The hotel features a 2,000sqm event space on a single level, including 2 pillar-free ballrooms with a 7-metre ceiling height. The Grand Ballroom boasts a high-resolution 9m x 5m LED for high-impact presentations, catering up to 900 guests for a cocktail.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: The hotel boasts 5 exciting dining choices, including 150-year history Inagiku Japanese Restaurant with its legendary tempura, Manho Chinese Restaurant, a daily buffet restaurant Shanghai City Bistro, a deli shop Java+ and a bespoke Lobby Lounge.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: A fully-equipped fitness centre with a 25-metre lap pool is located in 6th level. In addition, there's a luxurious SPA with 7 private treatment rooms. The 37th level of the hotel features an expansive Executive Lounge with 180° view of People Square.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: High Season 2, generate as much revenue as possible.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: High Season 1 - Generate as much revenue as possible.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: Discover unmatched hospitality, an unbeatable location and luxurious amenities at the new Shanghai Marriott Hotel City Centre. Located in the heart of downtown, our Shanghai hotel is within walking distance to Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street, People's Square, the Bund and the metro station. Premier among Shanghai hotels, we are the perfect place to unwind when traveling for business or leisure. Guest rooms and suites feature 42-inch LCD TVs, iPod docking stations, luxury bedding, Wi-Fi, safes, mini-bars and magnificent bathrooms. Enjoy international cuisine and local favorites from our chefs as they prepare various choices at our five restaurants and lounges. After a day in the city, take a dip in our indoor pool, visit our fully equipped gym or have a relaxing massage at our spa. Among hotels in Shanghai, amenities include a business center, 24-hour room service and concierge. More than 2,000 square meters of dedicated event space await with two pillar-free ballrooms and seven additional meeting rooms.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: Highlights of the Shanghai Marriott Hotel City Centre are the unbeatable location at the very centre of downtown Shanghai, large meeting space with 2 ballrooms, and Grand Ballroom featuring a 9 metre by 5 metre LED display wall for high-resolution presentations and videos. The hotel features 5 Food and Beverage outlets offering an outstanding array of choices for guests.

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?

Description.Text: RMB 630 for weekdays and RMB 1230 for weekends

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: 上海雅居乐万豪酒店坐落于繁华的西藏中路，俯瞰上海地理中心 – 人民广场，与各个最佳的文化、娱乐和购物场所近在咫尺。信步可至南京路步行街、人民公园、外滩以及人民广场地铁站。上海雅居乐万豪酒店专为成功商务人士或休闲旅客提供舒适的居住环境和便捷的设施。720间客房配备42英寸液晶电视、iPod音乐基座、万豪品牌“Revive”舒适之床、高速无线网络、迷你吧及宽敞的大理石浴室，并提供商务中心、24小时客房送餐以及礼宾服务。酒店设有5间餐厅提供中外美食及本地饕餮，犒赏食客的味蕾。在经历一天劳碌后，宾客可至设施齐全的健身中心放松身心，更有水疗中心提供舒适理疗及护肤体验。上海雅居乐万豪酒店另一大特色为完善的会议及活动设施。超过2,000平米的会议宴会场地配备2个无柱式宴会厅及7间独立会议室，是选择举办宴会的最佳选择。

TPA_Ext_InLang_MessageType.Title: 即日起预订获2,000万豪礼赏奖励积分

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: 即日起预订获2,000万豪礼赏奖励积分即日起预订上海雅居乐万豪酒店，即可获得2,000分万豪礼赏奖励积分。
